summary: Fã bate recorde mundial com coleção de produtos oficiais de Harry Potter
title: Fã bate recorde mundial com coleção de produtos oficiais de Harry Potter
description:
A maior coleção de itens do Mundo Bruxo foi oficialmente reconhecida pelo Guinness World Records, o livro dos recordes. Ela pertence a uma Sonserina: a britânica Victoria Maclean. Ela levou 18 anos para reunir 3.686 itens, todos produtos oficiais, incluindo peças da saga Harry Potter e da nova franquia Animais Fantásticos. Entre os itens da coleção estão: 26 bonecos Pop!, 115 broches de Harry Potter e Animais Fantásticos, 34 varinhas, 302 cartões postais e 114 livros de Harry Potter.

Clique para exibir o slide.

Victoria teve seu primeiro contato com a saga de J.K. Rowling em 2001, quatro anos após o lançamento de Harry Potter e a Pedra Filosofal. Sua coleção começou com uma cópia do primeiro livro e hoje possui até um banheiro decorado em homenagem à saga. “Eu estava grávida do meu filho mais velho e continuava ouvindo o nome Harry Potter. Acho que J.K. Rowling estava sendo entrevistada e eu pensei ‘quer saber, não posso fazer muito, então vou comprar o livro e vou ler’. Eu era disléxica, o livro era fino, parecia manejável. Então eu fui e comprei o livro. Duas semanas depois acabei e nunca mais olhei para trás”, disse Victoria em entrevista ao Guinness World. “Faz parte das nossas vidas. Minha cama é de Harry Potter. Minhas almofadas são de Harry Potter. Minhas meias, meus casacos. Tudo é de Harry Potter. Eu até tive um casamento temático de Harry Potter”, afirmou em entrevista à BBC.

CONTINUA DEPOIS DA PUBLICIDADE
(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

We all have that one friend who loves the wizarding world this much…

#Wizarding #Wizards #Witches pic.twitter.com/v1NnxI0pjr

— BBC Breakfast (@BBCBreakfast) March 25, 2019

Victoria revelou que o item mais raro e difícil de conseguir foi um quebra-cabeça banhado a ouro de 24 quilates do Japão. Apenas 5.000 peças foram feitas e Victoria demorou seis anos para conseguir seu exemplar. Mesmo possuindo uma coleção estimada em 100.000 libras (cerca de 510.000 reais), ela deseja continuar aumentando seu acervo. “Eu nunca vou parar de colecionar até que eu realmente precise. Eu não fumo, eu raramente bebo – este é o meu vício”, acrescentou.

O recorde anterior pertence ao mexicano Menahem Asher Silvas Vargas, que possui uma coleção com 3.097 itens da saga Harry Potter.

Leia também:
+ Primeira edição de Harry Potter e a Pedra Filosofal vai a leilão por 300 mil reais
+ Os Weasleys estão prontos para a Copa Mundial de Quadribol em novo set da Funko

The post Fã bate recorde mundial com coleção de produtos oficiais de Harry Potter appeared first on Potterish.com.

blog.name: berniedette
blog.title: Let me think about it
blog.description:
Bernie for the friendly. 
Young since '91. 
Dazed&confused with no direction.
I post whatever the hell I want.
I do have obsessions and if you scroll through, they should be obvious.

tags: or should i just take the plunge and finally watch game of thrones? ugh
summary: I just finished another tv series and I'm down in the dumps so I was wondering if anyone would recommend me a movie franchise to...
body: I just finished another tv series and I’m down in the dumps so I was wondering if anyone would recommend me a movie franchise to binge? Something with at least 3 movies? I’ve never seen Pirates, Star Wars, LOTR, Jurassic Park, Marvel, etc? I binged Harry Potter a couple of years ago, I’ve seen Twilight, that’s about it. Lolllll. I’ve never really watched movies with a lot of parts. I wanna get lost in a new universe. Thank you!

summary: Draco x reader - Let me "Just let me take care of you. Why are you so stubborn?" For Draco x reader maybe set in the battle of...
body:
Draco x reader - Let me

“Just let me take care of you. Why are you so stubborn?” For Draco x reader maybe set in the battle of Hogwarts and reader is the only Slytherin fighting for Hogwarts?💞💕🐍 - Anon❤️

You were the odd one out, the only Slytherin to fight with morals. You didn’t side with The Dark Lord and his death eaters. No, your chose to fight for Hogwarts.

As the fight ended, many people had died. No one has seen you. That was their first step, Ron, Hermione, Ginny, Luna and Harry all started to run around to find you.

Instead the found Draco wondering around aimlessly.

“Draco!”

“Potter.” It wasn’t said with hate for once.

They stared each other down, that when they heard it. Someone scraping their feet along the ground. Drawing their wands they all stood on high alert, but it dropped when they seen who t was.

“(Y/N)!” Hermione yelled.

You hand was wrapped tightly around your midsection, head had dried blood on and behind you was great blood that had dropped along. You gave them a weak smile and tried to carry on walking but Draco stopped you, wrapping one for your arms around her neck.

“Go get someone!”

They all froze, hesitant to leave you with him but they nodded, running off.

You couldn’t keep walking, your legs burnt, everything hurt. You collapsed to the ground, Draco laid you in your back and lifted your shirt.

“Go… away!” You growled.

“I’m trying to help!”

“You’ve done enough…”

Draco pushes his hands against your wound, making you scream in pain, tears running down your face.

“I’m sorry! I’m sorry!” He panicked.

After calming down, you tried to shove his hands away but they wouldn’t budge. Every time you move away he moved closer.

“Just let me take care of you. Why are you being so stubborn?” He sighed.

“You left us…” You mumbled.

“(Y/N) I… I know. I’m sorry, okay? Just… just let me help… please?”

His eyes begged you to say yes, dropping your head back to the floor you nodded. Drifting in and out of consciousness as he tried his best to help you. You vaugly remember the others coming back, being lifted, a medical room.

Once you finally woke up for good, you sat up a little. You were in the infirmary, there were a few others there as well. What caught your attention was the familiar platinum blond asleep on your bed.

“Draco…?”

His head shot up, eyes wild.

“(Y/N)!”

He threw himself at you, burying his face into your neck. Confused but not against it you hugged him back, that’s when he started crying, whispering he was sort ove rand over again.

“(Y/N) I’m so sorry, I didn’t mean for you to get hurt… they promised me you’d be safe… I’m sorry… please forgive me?”

“Draco I’m not mad at you, hurt yeah, mad no.”

“I love you! And I don’t want to lose you!” He blurted.

Smiling you laughed a little and his face fell. Draco went to get up but you grabbed his hand.

“I love you too… it’s just funny it took this long to say it.”

He looked confused for a second before a wide smile spread on his face. Climbing into the bed Draco pulled you into him, kissing your head as you hit got comfy, letting you drift back into a peaceful sleep

TAGS:

Harry Potter: @darth-dorle @stiffinme

All: @sitkafay @havlindzk @drakelover78

“I’m trying to help!”

“You’ve done enough…”

Draco pushes his hands against your wound, making you scream in pain, tears running down your face.

“I’m sorry! I’m sorry!” He panicked.

After calming down, you tried to shove his hands away but they wouldn’t budge. Every time you move away he moved closer.

“Just let me take care of you. Why are you being so stubborn?” He sighed.

“You left us…” You mumbled.

“(Y/N) I… I know. I’m sorry, okay? Just… just let me help… please?”

His eyes begged you to say yes, dropping your head back to the floor you nodded. Drifting in and out of consciousness as he tried his best to help you. You vaugly remember the others coming back, being lifted, a medical room.

Once you finally woke up for good, you sat up a little. You were in the infirmary, there were a few others there as well. What caught your attention was the familiar platinum blond asleep on your bed.

“Draco…?”

His head shot up, eyes wild.

“(Y/N)!”

He threw himself at you, burying his face into your neck. Confused but not against it you hugged him back, that’s when he started crying, whispering he was sort ove rand over again.

“(Y/N) I’m so sorry, I didn’t mean for you to get hurt… they promised me you’d be safe… I’m sorry… please forgive me?”

“Draco I’m not mad at you, hurt yeah, mad no.”

“I love you! And I don’t want to lose you!” He blurted.

Smiling you laughed a little and his face fell. Draco went to get up but you grabbed his hand.

“I love you too… it’s just funny it took this long to say it.”

He looked confused for a second before a wide smile spread on his face. Climbing into the bed Draco pulled you into him, kissing your head as you hit got comfy, letting you drift back into a peaceful sleep

Harry Potter: @darth-dorle @stiffinme

All: @sitkafay @havlindzk @drakelover78

summary: I LIKE THIS FIC SO MUCH I MADE IT A VISUAL THING. Draco is a journalist, Luna and Neville have a gigantic family of plants and...
caption:
I LIKE THIS FIC SO MUCH I MADE IT A VISUAL THING.

Draco is a journalist, Luna and Neville have a gigantic family of plants and Harry is ‘just hanging around’ and can’t quite bring himself to leave Draco alone. There’s long-overdue conversations, horticultural emergencies, unsanitary but very sexy things happening in the kitchen, and most importantly, cups of tea :)

The Generation Who Lived

https://archiveofourown.org/works/17614328

It’s the end of winter, one of those blinding days where the slanted rays of light are more evocative of the bitter cold outside than they are of the coming warmth of spring.

The house is all tall glass windows that bow towards the inside. The sitting room is hot, almost stuffy: a greenhouse filled with greenery. Muggle and magic plants are thrown together in a joyous cacophony of tall and stubby, leaves and stings, viridian and dark moss, a broad palette of greens.

Luna Lovegood takes the potted Snapping Asphodel sitting on the green velvet armchair and sets it on the worn rug. She settles herself in its place, one leg folded underneath her.

She raises large, pale, slightly unfocused eyes to me and smiles.

tags: he who shall not be named
summary: My husband and I took in a puppy from the streets and one of the first things my husband said was “we can’t name her” cuz we...
body:
My husband and I took in a puppy from the streets and one of the first things my husband said was “we can’t name her” cuz we weren’t gonna keep her.

So the first thing I did was name her Voldemae, She-Who-Shall-Not-Be-Named.


We took care of her a few days then my husband took her to the adoption place and they gave us a ID so we can keep tabs on her and make sure she gets adopted.

I look it up and they named her Flower

Me: da fuck?! How uninventive!

Husband: calm down

Me: what, did the chick look out the window going uh uh… spot a flower and be like yeah!

Husband: well at least they didn’t name her Lyndsey (an ongoing joke with us)

Me: Cheh she had a 50/50 chance to be named friggin Grass

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Louis Weasley, James Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

summary: Tom: Hey, wanna find out your gay name? Harry: I’m not ga— Tom: Your first name plus— Harry: I told you I’m not ga— Tom: *gets...

Harry: I told you I’m not ga—
